description: This is a PHP web application source file that renders a web page for managing SIP global parameters for voice diagnostics. It includes PHP code, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to display and handle form inputs related to SIP configuration, fetch current settings, and perform actions like starting/stopping SIP client and applying configuration changes.

methods.name: Dm_data_get
methods.description: Retrieves current global SIP configuration parameters as an associative array from device settings.
